prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon with a sleek, shadowy design and a mischievous personality.
Show me a Pokemon that has a striking combination of purple and cream colors, evoking a sense of stealth.
Design a quadruped Pokemon that excels in urban environments, with unique features that make it stand out.
Imagine a Pokemon that can blend into forests, featuring distinctive stripes and an agile body.
Generate a Pokemon with a playful attitude that loves to explore grasslands, using its colors to camouflage.
Give me a new evolution for Skuntank that enhances its stealth capabilities and has an intimidating appearance.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a skunk but has a more dynamic color palette and a powerful presence.
